reviewText: Some edited versions are decent, but those typically are more like alternate versions in which substitute content was shot with the knowledge that it would be used for a different version -- not the case here, where there is just not enough to be interesting.

I am in total agreement with the other reviewer. This is the worst edited video I've ever seen from penthouse. Nothing worth seeing. An 80s teen movie shows more skin. Rent Hardbodies 2 for a mild time. Don't waste your money here.
